channel.title: New to 317's, How do I edit NPC's coordinates?
channel.description: Well I made a new market area on my 317 PI server but I'm new to 317's, I don't know how I edit the coordinates of the npcs. If someone could please tell me that'd be great, thanks.

item.title: New to 317's, How do I edit NPC's coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Fc_skills Fc skills
item.description:
@Fc_skills wrote:

Im having the same trouble with mine.

But what i want to know is how to make a new shop area and commands for it? and putting shops in it?

Read full topic

item.title: New to 317's, How do I edit NPC's coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Crazyjackson78 Crazyjackson78
item.description:
@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:377573”]autospawn.cfg
Data\cfg[/quote]

I have no autospawn.cfg but I ran a search for spawn and found where it is, in spawn-config.cfg. Thank you very much, which I could +rep

Read full topic
